summary: Comprehensive scaffolding rental management system for Indonesian market with operations, accounting, and tax compliance features, designed for desktop use with fraud prevention controls
architectural_notes: System must implement comprehensive audit logging for all financial transactions and data modifications
Multi-level approval workflows required for high-value transactions and master data changes
Indonesian tax compliance: PPN (VAT), PPh (Income Tax), and e-Faktur system integration
Immutable transaction records using blockchain backend (Motoko on Internet Computer)
Role-based access control with segregation of duties between operations, accounting, and admin
Double-entry bookkeeping system with automatic journal entry generation
Real-time inventory tracking with RFID/barcode support for scaffolding items
Automated depreciation calculation for fixed assets per Indonesian accounting standards
Financial period lock mechanism to prevent backdated entries after period close
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional scaffolding equipment illustration for dashboard header (scaffolding-hero.dim_1200x300.png)
- Icon set for equipment categories: frames, boards, pipes, clamps, accessories, 5 icons in consistent style (equipment-icons.dim_400x80.png)
- Financial chart background with subtle Indonesian motif pattern (financial-bg.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create customer management module with CRUD operations storing company name, NPWP (tax ID), address, contact person, phone, email, and credit limit
Create vendor management module for scaffolding suppliers with company details, NPWP, bank account information, and payment terms

Create scaffolding inventory management system tracking item types (frames, boards, pipes, clamps, accessories), quantities, condition status (new, good, fair, damaged), location, and acquisition cost
Create rental order management system with booking, quotation approval, delivery scheduling, active rental tracking, and return processing with condition inspection
Create invoicing system with automatic invoice generation from rental orders, payment term tracking, partial payment support, payment status monitoring, and late payment alerts
Create Indonesian tax compliance module handling PPN (11% VAT), PPh 23 (2% withholding tax), tax invoice (faktur pajak) generation with sequential numbering, and monthly tax report preparation
Create double-entry accounting system with chart of accounts for rental business, journal entry recording, general ledger, accounts receivable, accounts payable, and cash/bank management
Create financial reporting module generating Income Statement (Profit & Loss), Balance Sheet, Cash Flow Statement, Trial Balance, and Indonesian tax reports formatted for submission

Create role-based access control system with roles (Super Admin, Admin, Accountant, Operations Staff, Sales), granular permissions per module, and approval workflows for sensitive operations like pricing changes, credit limit increases, and manual journal entries

Create financial dashboard with key metrics including total revenue, outstanding receivables, active rentals, equipment utilization rate, overdue payments, monthly tax obligations, and profit margin with graphical visualizations

Create data validation and fraud prevention controls including duplicate invoice checking, negative amount prevention, date range validation (no backdating beyond allowed period), rental period overlap detection, and inventory quantity reconciliation

Implement desktop-optimized responsive UI design with large clickable elements, keyboard navigation support, data tables with sorting and filtering, form validation with clear error messages, and print-friendly layouts for invoices and reports
Create user authentication system using Internet Identity for secure login with user session management and automatic logout after inactivity
All user-facing text, labels, buttons, messages, and report headers must be in Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia) while maintaining English for technical code and variable names

new_feature_requests.summary: Scaffolding inventory tracking system with item lifecycle management
Rental order management with booking, delivery, and return tracking
Pricing and quotation system with rate management
Invoicing system with payment tracking and collections
Indonesian tax compliance module (PPN, PPh, e-Faktur integration)
Full accounting system with general ledger, journal entries, and financial reports
Audit trail and activity logging for fraud prevention
Role-based access control with approval workflows
Financial reporting dashboard with Indonesian tax reports
Create pricing and quotation system with rate cards for daily, weekly, and monthly rental rates per item type, volume discounts, and project-based custom pricing
Create asset depreciation tracking system for scaffolding equipment using straight-line method with useful life configuration per asset category and monthly depreciation calculation
Create comprehensive audit trail system logging all data modifications including user, timestamp, action type (create/update/delete), old values, new values, and IP address
Create maintenance and repair tracking module for scaffolding equipment with maintenance schedules, repair history, cost tracking, and equipment downtime recording
Create customer credit limit enforcement system that blocks new rental orders when customer exceeds credit limit based on outstanding invoices and pending orders
